item.description:
Weather permitting, Gloria will lead a hike at Penwood State Park in Bloomfield. This is a 3 to 4 mile hike, with a couple of options for the route to make a loop. Some elevation gain, but nothing to difficult. Plan to meet in the parking lot at Penwood at 2:00 PM. A trail map can be found at the park link provided.

Gloria (http://hiking.meetup....) is leading on this one so please direct questions to her.

Penwood State Park map:
http://dep.state.ct.u...

PETS:
Pets on a leash are permitted in picnic areas and on hiking trails.

For more information, see http://dep.state.ct.u...

This event is cross-listed with the Hartford Heights Tall Club (http://socialnetwork.... ).

group.name: The Hartford Area Hikingâ„¢ Meetup Group

item.name: Hike at Penwood SP in Bloomfield CT
